title: Food & Cooking
part1: How often do you eat out?
What kind of food is popular in your country?

part2.cue_card_topic: Describe a dish you enjoy cooking or eating.
cue_card_points: and explain why you like it.

part3: How have people's eating habits changed over time?
What are the advantages and disadvantages of fast food?
